name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with expertise in **automation**, **troubleshooting**, and **robotics**, bringing over 13 years of experience in developing high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Proven ability to solve complex problems with a strong emphasis on **customer service** and excellent communication skills.

Demonstrated experience in **problem-solving** with a technical background in **JavaScript/TypeScript, Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside proficiency in **React, Next.js, Vue, Node.js, FastAPI**, and **Django** for both frontend and backend development. Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing modern architectural strategies such as **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and CI/CD pipelines.

Vast knowledge in building innovative AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, well-aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong foundation in MLOps including model training, serving, and orchestration utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
